articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Order to Raise Military Ranks of Artistes of State Merited Chorus and Moranbong Band
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Order to Raise Military Ranks of Artistes of State Merited Chorus and Moranbong Band 
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Saturday gave the order No. 00104 on raising the ranks of commanding officers, creators and artistes of the State Merited Chorus and the Moranbong Band. 
					 He said in the order that the creators and artistes of the State Merited Chorus and the Moranbong Band gave joint performances in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea at the highest level, demonstrating the might of the Juche-oriented art all over the world and making hurrah for the glorious WPK ring out loudly in the significant month of October. 
					
					 According to the order, lieut. general of Army went to Jang Ryong Sik, senior colonel of Army to Sol Thae Song and five others, colonel of Army to Jong Mun Song and 61 others, lieut. colonel of Army to Choe Kwang Nam and 42 others, major of Army to Jo Kwang Chol and 33 others, senior captain of Army to Kim Won Guk and 12 others, captain of Army to Jang Chung Sim and 41 others, first lieutenant to Choe Kwang Hyok and 29 others and second lieutenant to Kim Jin U and 11 others.

articles.title: Titles of Honor and Orders to Artistes of State Merited Chorus and Moranbong Band
articles.content:
Titles of Honor and Orders to Artistes of State Merited Chorus and Moranbong Band 
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Titles of honor and orders were awarded to commanding officers, creators, artistes and members of the State Merited Chorus and the Moranbong Band in the DPRK. 
					 They represented in a fresh and peculiar style hymns of the great era of Kim Jong Un and songs of advance for the final victory reflecting the sacred 70-year history of the Workers' Party of Korea and wishes and aspiration of the party, the revolution and people, thus making a great contribution to powerfully inspiring all the service personnel and people in their dynamic advance for a rosy future under the flag of the party. 
					
					 According to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly promulgated on Saturday, the title of People's Artiste went to Hyon Un Chol and two persons, People's Actor to Mun Il Hwan and one person, Merited Artiste to Ri Kyong Dok, Merited Actor to Ji Su Won and two persons, Order of National Flag First Class to seven persons, Order of Labor to 23 persons, Order of National Flag Second Class to six persons and Order of National Flag Third Class to 11 persons.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Prize to Orchestra and Male Chorus "We'll Travel One Road Forever"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Prize to Orchestra and Male Chorus "We'll Travel One Road Forever" 
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il Prize was awarded to orchestra and male chorus "We'll Travel One Road Forever". 
					 It reflects the sacred 70-year history of the Workers' Party of Korea and the steadfast faith and will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to remain single-mindedly faithful forever to the great mother party despite stern tempest and ordeals. 
					
					 A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK in this regard was promulgated on Saturday.

articles.title: CPRK Blasts S. Korean Military for Opening Fire into Patrol Boat of DPRK in West Sea
articles.content:
CPRK Blasts S. Korean Military for Opening Fire into Patrol Boat of DPRK in West Sea 
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Sunday as the south Korean military warmongers committed a serious military provocation against the DPRK in the West Sea of Korea:
					 On Saturday the south Korean warmongers opened fire into a patrol boat of the DPRK on its routine patrol duty in the waters of the north side in the West Sea, claiming that the boat came close to the "northern limited line" and talking about "warning".
					
					 The shelling that was committed in broad daylight was a deliberate provocation to spark off a military conflict in the tension-charged waters of the West Sea of Korea and again escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 We can not but take a serious note of the fact that the provocation was timed to coincide with the frantic anti-DPRK war exercises like combined naval drill and Hoguk drill which the south Korean warmongers are staging with a U.S. nuclear carrier involved while crying out for "resolute punishment" and "conditioned counteraction" with military brass hats including the chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff touring the forefront areas including Yonphyong Islet.
					
					 Now underway at Mt. Kumgang Resort is the reunion of separated families and relatives amid great concern and interest at home and abroad thanks to the positive and sincere efforts made by the DPRK.
					
					 Seeing them reunite with each other, sharing warm kindred feelings after so many years of separation, all the fellow countrymen keenly feel the urgency of national reunification and hope that the atmosphere of reconciliation will bear a rich fruit.
					
					 The recent military provocation of the south Korean military gangsters was a dangerous act aimed to chill the hard-won atmosphere of improving the relations and totally derail the process for implementing the north-south agreement.
					
					 The recent case clearly proves who is to blame for harassing peace, escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula and bedeviling the north-south relations.
					
					 There will be only a war disaster, far from the improvement of the north-south relations, as long as the south Korean military warmongers go reckless, going against the nation's desire and wish for national reunification.
					
					 No matter how dear peace is to us, we will never pardon provokers going reckless, being seized by confrontation and war, but mercilessly punish them.
					
					 If the south Korean military warmongers persist in reckless military provocations, not dropping the bad habit of cooking up a shocking incident and inciting confrontation, they will spark off an unpredictable armed conflict and the north-south relations will again reach the extremes as what they were before the August agreement.
					
					 The south Korean authorities will be wholly accountable for it.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers had better act with discretion, clearly understanding it will get nothing through its military provocation against the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Friendship Tower
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Friendship Tower
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Friendship Tower on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front.
					 Present at a wreath-laying ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health who double as chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, Kim Hyong Ryong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Kwang Hyon, vice-minister of People's Security, officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					 Also present were Zhang Chenggan, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Chinese embassy here, and his embassy officials, a delegation of the Ministry of Civil Affairs of China led by Minister Li Liguo, Chinese guests staying in the DPRK, Chinese students and Chinese residents in the DPRK.
					
					 A wreath in the joint name of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet was laid before the tower.
					
					 Placed there were wreaths in the names of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces. Ministry of People's Security, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ministry of External Economic Relations, Ministry of Culture, Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the C.C., the DPRK-China Friendship Association, the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Pyongyang City People's Committee, the Chinese embassy here, the delegation of the Ministry of Civil Affairs of China and the C.C., the Federation of Chinese Residents in Korea.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs of the Chinese People's Volunteers r.
					
					 On the same day, wreaths were laid before cemeteries and graves of the CPV martyrs in Hyongjesan District, Anju City, Hoechang and Onsong counties and other places.
					
					 Meanwhile, there took place an inaugural ceremony of the cemetery of the CPV martyrs rebuilt in Kaesong City that day.
					
					 Wreathes were laid before the cemetery in memory of the CPV martyrs.

articles.title: Sports Contest of Diplomatic Corps Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest of Diplomatic Corps Closes
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The 3rd three day-long sports contest of diplomatic corps in the DPRK came to a close on Sunday in Pyongyang.
					 The team of UN cooperation organizations took the first place in volleyball event and the team of the Mongolian embassy in basketball event.
					
					 In football event, the final match was held between the team of the Russian embassy and the team of UN cooperation organizations on Sunday.
					
					 Among spectators were Sim Kuk Ryong, general director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies, their family members and local sports fans.
					
					 The team of the Russian embassy defeated the latter.
					
					 Meanwhile, there took place diverse amusement games.
					
					 Prizes were awarded to successful teams and individuals, which was followed by a show of national foods prepared by families of diplomats.

articles.title: DPRK-China Friendship Cemented during Korean War
articles.content:
DPRK-China Friendship Cemented during Korean War
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- 65 years has passed since the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers (CPV) into the Korean front (October 25, 1950).
					 The DPRK-China friendship formed during the anti-Japanese war was further promoted in the period of the Korean War (1950-1953).
					
					 The U.S. imperialists provoked a war against the young DPRK on June 25, 1950. At that time, the Chinese party and government sent the volunteers to the Korean front under the banner of resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland.
					
					 The CPV fighters together with the Korean People's Army (KPA) had defended the DPRK at the cost of their life, showing mass heroism to the full extent.
					
					 During the war, the CPV produced a number of well-known heroes and unsung heroes who dedicated their life to defending the DPRK. Among those heroes are Mao Anying, son of Chairman Mao Zedong, Huang Jiguang who blocked the enemy's gun muzzle with his breast and Yang Gensi who destroyed an enemy tank at the cost of life.
					
					 The Korean people assisted the CPV with all their sincerity in the self-sacrificing spirit. The DPRK people are still remembering Pak Jae Gun, a farmer who sheltered a wounded CPV soldier at the cost of his life, An Ok Hui who died a heroic death to rescue CPV soldiers and other well-known or unknown heroes.
					
					 The DPRK government and people built the Friendship Tower at the foot of Moran Hill in Pyongyang and cemeteries of the CPV fallen fighters in different parts of the country to hand down the militant fraternity between the DPRK and China to posterity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Greatness and Invincible Might of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Greatness and Invincible Might of WPK 
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea is the party of the leader and the revolutionary party of Juche in which the monolithic idea and leadership of the leader and succession are firmly guaranteed; this is the greatest feat performed by the WPK in its arduous and trying 70 year-long historical course and herein lie the greatness and invincible might of the party. Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article.
					 The 70 year-long history of the WPK precisely means the history of the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, and the undying feats performed by the WPK in the revolution and construction are linked with their august names, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 There are many political parties in the world that boast of their long history and tradition but there is no such invincible revolutionary party as the WPK which has steadfastly carried forward its monolithic idea and lineage.
					
					 No matter what storm and stress the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il faces and no matter how frequently the generation of the revolution is replaced by a new one, its cause is sure to triumph.
					
					 Only when we advance under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, can we add shine to the WPK as the glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun started on Mt. Paektu. This is the unshakable faith deeply cherished in the hearts of all service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 They will more dynamically advance to bring earlier the final victory of the Korean revolution, rallied close around the Party Central Committee headed by Kim Jong Un with single mind, holding Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leaders.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Songun Politics of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Songun Politics of WPK 
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea serves as a treasured sword for winning all victories as they reliably defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation and pave the way for carving out the destiny independently, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 Sovereignty is what keeps the country and nation alive and Songun is the lifeline for achieving sovereignty, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean nation which had been subject to the fate of a colonial slave for it had a weak army is now demonstrating its high dignity and honor as the great Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's nation thanks to Songun.
					
					 Thanks to the great Songun politics based on the invincible revolutionary armed forces, the Korean people are successfully defending and carving out their destiny, resolutely foiling the imperialists' aggression and interference. The present and future of the Korean nation would be unthinkable without Songun politics. 
					
					 Reality once again teaches the lesson of history that peace can never be achieved by begging and it is possible to preserve it only by dint of a powerful army.
					
					 Songun politics protects not only Koreans in the north but all other compatriots in the south.
					
					 The U.S. used to threaten with nuclear weapons those countries and nations courting its displeasure, ignite wars against them and mercilessly trample down them. But it dares not attack the DPRK. 
					
					 Songun politics serves as a treasured sword for averting aggression and war on the Korean Peninsula, reliably guaranteeing the reunification and prosperity of the nation and paving the way for carving out its destiny independently.

articles.title: U.S. Has Neither Qualifications Nor Face to Talk about Human Rights
articles.content:
U.S. Has Neither Qualifications Nor Face to Talk about Human Rights
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Department of State released a report recently on the results of the examination of some 350 recommendations made by delegates of many countries at a meeting of working groups for regular examination of the universally accepted human rights under the UN Human Rights Council.
					 In the report the U.S. openly objected to the recommendations calling for measures for halting U.S. deployment of its forces overseas, investigating tortures committed by the CIA, legal and administrative steps against U.S. forces' killing of civilians during Iraqi and Afghan wars, steps for stopping the excessive use of police force, etc. It justified its practices mentioned in the recommendations allegedly accepted by it, putting up conditionalities.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article says the U.S. has neither qualifications nor face to talk about human rights. The article goes on:
					
					 It is not long since the U.S. appeared on the earth. Yet, it occupies a vast fertile land in North America, keeps a dense network of military bases in various parts of the world and established a dollar-dominated international monetary system. This was not the fortune brought to it by the heaven and not ascribable to the great feats performed by it in the field of human rights. All what it accomplished was the result of the robbery perpetrated against the international community.
					
					 It is preposterous, indeed, for the empire of evils ill-famed for massacre and genocide to talk volumes about human rights.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to stop taking issue with other countries over "human rights issues" and deeply reflect on the history of its hideous human rights abuses and apologize to the world for them.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Military Provocations against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Military Provocations against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean military group introduced U.S. nuclear-powered aircraft carrier Ronal Reagan into the waters off Pusan, south Korea under the pretext of participating in a "naval review".
					 Meanwhile, there took place talks between military bosses of south Korea and Japan in Seoul which discussed on the issue of boosting the U.S.-Japan-south Korea cooperation over the "north's nuclear and missile issue".
					
					 Leading papers here Sunday in their commentaries say intolerable are the south Korean authorities' acts of perpetrating military provocations against the dialogue partner in league with foreign forces at a time when they should opt for defusing tension and paving the way of peace and cooperation by implementing the north-south agreement.
					
					 These are grave military provocations deliberately aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula while chilling the atmosphere of dialogue and the process for improving the relations between the north and the south, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have a sincere willingness to implement the north-south agreement and push forward dialogue and improved relations, they should stop such military provocations as hurting fellow countrymen in the north in league with foreign forces at this time.
					
					 Their persistent moves are dangerous acts of pushing the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe again.
					
					 The reality clearly proves that they have only a sinister intention to escalate the confrontation with the north at any cost by depending on foreign forces, in disregard of the detente and improved relations between the north and the south.
					
					 Minju Joson says if they ignite a war of aggression in collusion with foreign forces, turning their faces away from dialogue and cooperation with fellow countrymen, the DPRK will have no option but to resolutely counter them by mobilizing all physical means.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Hold in Check Exchange of Cooperation between North and South Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Hold in Check Exchange of Cooperation between North and South Slammed 
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on Oct. 21 denouncing the south Koran authorities for blocking cooperation and exchange between the north and the south.
					 The statement said that the regime put a block on further development, asserting that it disallowed the working-level contact between the North Side and South Side committees for implementing the June 15 joint declarations with the south-north relations into consideration and it can not allow the exchange of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration for its political nature.
					
					 The regime completely held in check the civilian exchange and cooperation under the pretext of "May 24 step" and, therefore, the inter-Korean relations have been bedeviled, the statement noted.
					
					 It urged the regime to stop the unreasonable regulation on civilian exchange but comprehensively ensure it in accordance with the agreement of the south-north high-level urgent contact.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Sycophantic Policy Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Sycophantic Policy Denounced
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea in a statement on Oct. 22 denounced the authorities for siding with Japan keen to reinvade Korea.
					 The Japanese Defence minister on Oct. 20 said at the talks between defense ministers that it does not necessarily need the consent of south Korea when the "Self-Defence Forces" advance into north Korea, the statement recalled.
					
					 The minister openly revealed the SDF's attack on the peninsula, a result of south Korea's humiliating diplomacy and military policy by which it has supported Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defence," the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The SDF's advance into the peninsula, led by the U.S. forces, under the pretext of "rear support" and "protection of civilians" is little short of aiming to put the fate of the peninsula under the control of the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 Stressing the need to resolutely check the SDF's advance into the peninsula, the statement said, strongly denouncing the present regime's sycophantic and traitorous policy of cooperating with Japan in its moves for reinvasion in the wake of introducing textbooks justifying Japan's history of aggression.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by International Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by International Organization
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain posted the full text of "3. Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully" of President Kim Il Sung's work "Report to the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee" on One Corea Network on Oct. 9.
					 The part of the work, published on October 10, Juche 69 (1980), refers to the struggle of the WPK for national reunification in the period under review and tasks for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 It sets forth the new reunification proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) on the three principles of national reunification and the 10-point administrative policy to be carried out by the DFRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech Introduced by Nigerian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech Introduced by Nigerian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian newspaper Nigerian Observer on Oct. 20 carried the full text of the speech made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the military parade and public procession of Pyongyang citizens for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The speech, made on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the history of the WPK means the road covered by the people, the strength of the party is the strength of the people, the greatness of the party is their greatness and the victory our party gained is the victory of the great Korean people.
					
					 It also deals with the task facing the WPK in its efforts to discharge its important and sacred mission in the future, too, as the party of devotion taking deep care of the people and an unchangeable motherly party.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Foreign Media 
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers and magazines carried special articles illustrated with portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The Ugandan paper Sun Rise on October 8 in an article titled "Invincibility of WPK" said the WPK is now demonstrating its might as an invincible party because it is guided by the Juche idea and achieved steel-like unity and enjoys absolute support and trust from all the people. 
					
					 The Tanzanian paper Uhuru on October 8 said Kim Jong Un laid it down as an eternal strategy of the Korean revolution to advance straight along the way of independence, Songun and socialism indicated by the great leaders. 
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un full of youthful energy and enthusiasm is the symbol of the dignity of the WPK, the paper added. 
					
					 The Venezuelan paper Vea on October 10 said the dream of the Korean people to see a thriving socialist nation is neither a fancy nor a hope in the distant future. A lot of monumental structures for the people have appeared in different parts of the DPRK thanks to the plan and resolution of the WPK, the paper stressed.

articles.title: Int'l Body Praises WPK
articles.content:
Int'l Body Praises WPK 
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain posted on its internet website an article titled "Party for people" on October 9 to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The article said:
					
					 The WPK's 70-year history is the history of the mother party which has existed for the people and served them, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The WPK has demonstrated its invincible might without the slightest mistake or deviation from its line since its foundation and this was possible thanks to the outstanding leadership and great efforts and dedication of the great leaders who devoted themselves to the revolution and the people. 
					
					 Under the leadership of the great leaders the Korean revolution has won only victories in its history and the people's paradise was built in the DPRK where the people praise the party as their home taking care of them. 
					
					 South Korean people also revere the great leaders.

articles.title: WPK's 70th Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
WPK's 70th Anniversary Marked Abroad 
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- There took place friendship meetings, photo and book exhibitions, film shows and receptions at the DPRK missions in Cuba, Vietnam, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, UK, the Czech Republic, Romania, Italy, Poland, Egypt, Senegal, Guinea, Nigeria, Brazil and Mexico from October 3 to 9 to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos showing party building and leadership exploits and Songun leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books and photos introducing the victorious and glorious history of the invincible WPK. 
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched Korean films "Pyongyang Today" and "Masikryong Ski Resort." 
					
					 Present there on invitation were personages of political parties, national assemblies, ministries, organizations and institutions and members of the organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and the organizations for the study of the Juche idea in the relevant countries. Officials of the DPRK missions were present at the events. 
					
					 Speakers at the events expressed the belief that the WPK and the Korean people would win the final victory in the drive for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification.

articles.title: Romanian Personage Supports Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
Romanian Personage Supports Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry 
						
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- World progressives fully supported the just demands of the DPRK.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said this in his statement on October 21. 
					
					 The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK on October 17 issued a statement urging the U.S. to give up its hostile policy toward the DPRK and meet the principled demand of Pyongyang for replacing the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty if it sincerely hopes for peace on the Korean Peninsula, he said, and went on:
					
					 As clarified by the statement, an all-out war is being averted on the Korean Peninsula which is in the state of ceasefire and it is entirely thanks to the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK. 
					
					 The issue of replacing the AA by a peace treaty is the issue which requires a bold decision of the U.S., above all, and a principled agreement should be reached between the DPRK and the U.S., first of all. 
					
					 The U.S. should not groundlessly shun any longer the issue of concluding a peace treaty but prudently take a right option. 
					
					 The U.S. should respond to the principled stand of the DPRK at an early date as it is the arch criminal disturbing peace on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. should pay heed to the just conscience of the world and behave itself.

articles.title: Week of DPRK Film Show Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Week of DPRK Film Show Opens in Russia 
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- An opening ceremony of the week of the DPRK film show in the year of Russia-Korea friendship took place at a cinema in Moscow on October 21. 
					 Present at the ceremony were the chairman of the organizing committee for the international detective film festival of the Russian Federation and personages in the field of movie industry of Russia and the DPRK ambassador to Russia and his embassy officials and a Korean movie persons delegation. 
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 The chairman of the organizing committee said the week of Korean film show is being held in Moscow in the year of Russia-Korea friendship. 
					
					 The Korean films to be shown truthfully reflect the noble sentiments of the Korean people who devoted their lives to defending their country with deep trust in the leader and love for the country and its people, he said, and went on:
					
					 Korean films will help the Russian audience know well about how the service personnel and people of the DPRK defeated the U.S. imperialists, the provoker of the Korean War, with ennobling spirit and through a heroic struggle. 
					
					 The week of the Korean film show will be a good opportunity for developing the Russia-Korea friendly relations. 
					
					 The participants enjoyed the Korean film "Wolmi Island."

articles.title: Otorgados titulos honorarios y ordenes a miembros de Coro Estatal Benemerito y banda Moranbong
articles.content:
Otorgados titulos honorarios y ordenes a miembros de Coro Estatal Benemerito y banda Moranbong
						
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fueron otorgados a los miembros de mando, creadores, artistas y otros integrantes del Coro Estatal Benemerito y la banda Moranbong los titulos de Artista del Pueblo, Actor del Pueblo, de Artista Benemerito, de Actor Benemerito y ordenes de la RPDC.
					De acuerdo con el decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC divulgado el dia 24, fueron otorgados el titulo de Artista del Pueblo a Hyon Un Chol y a otros 2; el de Actor del Pueblo a Mun Il Hwan y a otro; el de Artista Benemerito a Ri Kyong Dok; el de Actor Benemerito a Ji Su Won y a otros 2; la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase a los 7; la Orden de Trabajo a los 23; la Orden Bandera Nacional de segunda clase a los 6; la Orden Bandera Nacional de tercera clase a los 11.
					
					Los condecorados describieron con peculiaridad los himnos de la epoca de Kim Jong Un, canciones de marcha hacia la victoria final, que reflejan la sagrada historia de 70 anos del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, la demanda y aspiracion del partido, la revolucion y el pueblo y contribuyeron mucho a estimular la lucha de todos los militares y civiles coreanos quienes avanzan a pasos firmes hacia el radiante futuro bajo la bandera del PTC.
					
					Fue publicado el dia 24 el decreto concerniente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea al respecto.

articles.title: Otorgado Premio Kim Jong Il a musica orquestal y coro masculine
articles.content:
Otorgado Premio Kim Jong Il a musica orquestal y coro masculino
						
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fue otorgado el Premio Kim Jong Il a la musica orquestal y coro masculino "Iremos siempre por nuestro camino", que sintetiza la sagrada historia de 70 anos del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y patentiza la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos de ser siempre fieles al partido madre superando todas las dificultades de toda indole.
					El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC publico el dia 24 un decreto correspondiente al respecto.

articles.title: Amistad combativa de pueblos coreano y chino manifestada en guerra coreana
articles.content:
Amistad combativa de pueblos coreano y chino manifestada en guerra coreana
						
   Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- Hoy es el dia del 65o aniversario de la participacion de los voluntarios del Pueblo Chino en el frente coreano.
					   La amistad entre el pueblo coreano y el chino, nacida en las llamaradas de la sangrienta contienda antijaponesa, se puso de pleno manifiesto tambien en la pasada guerra coreana (1950-1953) como amistad combativa.
					
					   Los imperialistas yanquis provocaron el 25 de junio de 1950 la guerra coreana con la ambicion de tomar hegemonia en Asia y el resto del mundo, debido a lo cual ante la joven Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se acercaba un tiempo de severas pruebas. 
					
					   En aquel entonces, el partido y el gobierno de China despacharon al frente coreano los voluntarios compuestos por sus hijos valientes.
					
					   Ellos lucharon abnegadamente en las mismas trincheras con el Ejercito Popular de Corea defendiendo a costa de la vida la tierra coreana.
					
					   En colaboracion con las unidades del EPC, los voluntarios chinos participaron en los grandes combates y operaciones en zona de Kaechon y a las orillas del rio Chongchon y del lago Jangjin y pusieron destino de exterminio a las unidades combinadas imperialistas poniendo de manifiesto el heroismo masivo.
					
					   Los pilotos de las fuerzas aereas de los voluntarios chinos junto con los pilotos coreanos aplastaron a los aeropiratas yanquis y los artilleros antiaereos, zapadores y otros combatientes lucharon tambien con valentia.
					
					   El martir Mao Anying, hijo del Presidente Mao Zedong, y otros muchos heroes chinos dedicaron hasta su vida contribuyendo al triunfo de los combates.
					
					   Aun en las condiciones dificiles de guerra, el pueblo coreano envio con sinceridad provisiones alimentarias y utensilios a los voluntarios chinos.
					
					   El campesino coreano Pak Jae Gun protegio a un voluntario chino herido sacrificando su vida y la moradora An Ok Hui dedico tambien su vida para salvar a un soldado chino.
					
					   El gobierno y el pueblo de la RPDC levantaron el Monumento a la Amistad a la orilla de la capitalina colina Moran y construyeron los cementerios de los martires chinos caidos en la guerra coreana en Hoechang, Unsan, Kaechon, Jangjin, Kaesong, la falda del pico Sanggam, la orilla del rio Kumsong y otros lugares para transmitir sus meritos.
